actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class org.klotski.graphics.LoginPage
Implementation of ActionListener.actionPerformed(ActionEvent) function.
It controls if quit button or enter button are clicked and exit to close the program or to store the selected user.
actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class org.klotski.graphics.Window
Override of ActionListener.actionPerformed(ActionEvent) function.
Every button, when performing an action, calls the right controller and stops or starts the timer if necessary
addLine(int, int) - Method in class org.klotski.coding.GameSaver

addUser(String) - Method in class org.klotski.coding.UsernameCollector
Adds one user into the vector and writes it into users.txt.
It writes the names uppercase and checks if the file is correct
addUserScore(String, int) - Method in class org.klotski.coding.HighScoreUpdater
